Description: Mould-made pottery plastic handle broken from the rear of a lamp, decorated with Isis-Demeter, draped and veiled, holding a large torch and a fruit. At the rear is a firing-hole and the upper spring of an applied loop handle. Traces of an orange slip remain.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2010)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
